analyzed: pāda guhya guda nābhi hṛd śiraḥ dhātu maṇḍala gam eru pṛṣṭha gam
translated: The Praise of Vasanta-tilaka🔽I bow to you, Heruka of both minds, who resides in the head, heart, navel, anus, and secret place, in the skull garland, on the back of Meru,

analyzed: nāḍikā samaya vajra padma gam tvām namāmi ubhaya citta herukam
translated: In the channels, at the time of the vajra and lotus - I bow to you.🔽I bow to you, Heruka of the innate self, who resides in the five spaces within the lotus of the secret part, in the great sky of the dharma realm,

analyzed: dharma dhātu tilaka advaya advayam tvām namāmi sahaja ātma herukam  kāla megha paṭala antara ucchalat avidyut ugra paṭala adhika tviṣam
translated: Beyond the two and non-dual - I bow to you.🔽I bow to you, Heruka of the world, whose brilliance surpasses the fierce lightning flashes shining from within the mass of dark clouds,

original: sattvabhājanayugapradāhikāṃ tvāṃ namāmi jagadamba herukīm // //🔽nābhicakrakuharāmburāśito vajravārijasamājasaṃbhavām /
analyzed: sattva bhājana yuga pradāhikām tvām namāmi jagat amba herukīm  nābhi cakra kuhara amburāśitaḥ vajra vārija samāja saṃbhavām
translated: Who burns the world and the vessels - I bow to you, mother of the world, Heruki.🔽I bow to you, who arises from the assembly of vajra and lotus in the ocean of the navel chakra,

analyzed: saudha sāra rasa pāna lampaṭām tvām namāmi baḍavānala tviṣam
translated: Who is eager to drink the essence of the essence of the moon - I bow to you, who have the brilliance of the submarine fire.
The praise of Shri Vasanta-tilaka is complete.
